thread.title: Where Would Stocks Be Now if Hillary Clinton Were President?

author: James Mackintosh
title: Where Would Stocks Be Now if Hillary Clinton Were President?
text:
What if Hillary Clinton had won? A year on from the inauguration of Donald Trump as president, Democrats are if anything more upset than they were then. Investors, not so much. So, where would markets be if Mrs. Clinton, not Mr. Trump, were in charge of the presidential Twitter account?

A few things are clear. There wouldn’t have been a huge corporate tax cut. Small business confidence, based on hopes of less red tape, wouldn’t have leaped to the highest since Ronald Reagan’s first term as president. Banks wouldn’t be expecting... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
